com.facebook.buck.android

Interface NativeLibraryBuildRule

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NdkLibrary, PrebuiltNativeLibrary

    public interface NativeLibraryBuildRule
    BuildRule that contains various .so files for Android, organized by target CPU architecture.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Path getLibraryPath()
      Returns the path to the directory containing .so files organized by target CPU architecture.
      boolean isAsset() 

    • Method Detail

      • isAsset

        boolean isAsset()
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating whether the .so files in the directory returned by getLibraryPath() should be included in the assets folder in the APK.

      • getLibraryPath

        Path getLibraryPath()
        Returns the path to the directory containing .so files organized by target CPU architecture. This often contains subdirectories such as:
        • armeabi
        • armeabi-v7a
        Returns:
        A path relative to the project root that should does not include a trailing slash.
